title: A pastorall called the Arcadia Acted by her Majesties Servants at the Phænix in Drury Lane. Written by Iames Shirly Gent.
author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
publisher: Printed by J[ohn] D[awson] for Iohn Williams, and F. Eglesfeild and are to be sould at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: An adaptation of: Sidney, Sir Philip.  Arcadia.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Michigan. Library.
